unnormalised: Urban planning in India faces complex challenges, particularly in rapidly growing cities like Mumbai and Delhi. Effective policy implementation is crucial. Consider the impact of the 74th Constitutional Amendment Act of 1992. Sustainable solutions are needed to address issues from 10:00 hrs daily, such as affordable housing and transportation, as seen in the Navi Mumbai project initiated on 26/01/1972. The NITI Aayog must play a stronger role from 15/08/2023, ensuring equitable development and resource allocation of Rs. 500 Cr. across urban centers.
normalised: Urban planning in India faces complex challenges, particularly in rapidly growing cities like Mumbai and Delhi. Effective policy implementation is crucial. Consider the impact of the seventy fourth Constitutional Amendment Act of one thousand nine hundred and ninety two. Sustainable solutions are needed to address issues from ten zero zero hours daily, such as affordable housing and transportation, as seen in the Navi Mumbai project initiated on twenty sixth january one thousand nine hundred and seventy two. The N I T I Aayog must play a stronger role from fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three, ensuring equitable development and resource allocation of rupees five hundred crore across urban centers.
